question: The name of the Indian shooter who won gold medal at the ISSF Junior World Cup Rifle / Pistol / Shotgun in Sydney, Australia is;
explanation: nish Bhanwala won gold medal in the men's 25m Rapid Fire Pistol Junior event at the ISSF Junior World Cup Rifle / Pistol / Shotgun in Sydney, Australia. Anish Bhanwala scored 29 hits and won gold medal in the men's 25m Rapid Fire Pistol Junior event. This is the 3rd individual gold medal for India in the ISSF Junior World Cup. China's Cheng Zhipeng scored 27 hits and won silver medal. China's Zhang Jueming scored 23 hits and won bronze medal in the men's 25m Rapid Fire Pistol Junior event. China won the team gold medal and created a new Junior World Record with 1733 points. India's Anish Bhanwala, Anhad Jawanda and Adarsh Singh won silver medal.
